trans-unit.source: Enables the extension of specific behaviors of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Habilita a extensão de comportamentos específicos de um designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time view control object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de controle de exibição de tempo de design para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The view control object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de controle de exibição do designer.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the design-time HTML for the designer's control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o HTML em tempo de design para o controle do designer.

trans-unit.source: The HTML used at design time to format the control.
trans-unit.target: O HTML usado em tempo de design para formatar o controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Provides an opportunity to perform processing when the designer enters or exits template mode.
trans-unit.target: Dá uma oportunidade de executar o processamento quando o designer entra ou sai do modo de modelo.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerBehavior.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerBehavior.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> e <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerBehavior.OnTemplateModeChanged" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerBehavior.OnTemplateModeChanged" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerBehavior.OnTemplateModeChanged" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerBehavior.OnTemplateModeChanged" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.
